com.risk.model

Class GamePlayModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.GamePlayModel

  • public class GamePlayModel
extends java.util.Observable
    "GamePlayerModel" class represents an object containing current map and players.
